room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield in New York
review: Our captain Jamie was very helpful. When we were stuck she helped us out. Made us laugh in the process. Awesome experience, I highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield in New York
review: I have now completed all 4 of the rooms here at Amazing Escape Room Bloomfield location and I must say they are all great! Down the rabbit hole is great for the family if you have kids. Today I did Lost in Space and the Gold Rush. and the rooms awesome! Matt our game master is space was always ready when we needed a clue and Alyssa our game master in gold rush gave great clues to help us through. and Mike the manager is super nice and very accommodating. 5 star 2 thumbs up!
